::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod hears Savvana's message over the comlink. And replys.
"Savvana. This is Hot Rod. Kluster is with me. We are at the
Cybertronian Fire, fighting Preds. He is a little busy with one, and
cant respond. Hot Rod, out."
